AI Description: QScintilla is a port to Qt of Neil Hodgson's Scintilla editing component. It provides a rich text editing features and is commonly used for source code editing in integrated development environments (IDEs) and text editors.
Core Features: Syntax highlighting, code folding, auto-completion, indentation guides, line numbering, and extensive customization options for text editors and IDEs.
General Tags: Text Editing, Source Code Editing, Ides
